'''Cartoon Network''' is a television network created to air and promote exclusively animated series, such as {{w|Dexter's Laboratory}}, {{w|The Powerpuff Girls}}, {{w|Edd, Edd n' Eddy}}, {{w|Codename: Kids Next Door}}, and {{w|The Amazing World of Gumball}}. Several properties made by the network have collaborated with [[Mojang Studios]].
